Package: com.github.jrubygradle

[Groovy] Class JRubyPrepareJars

      • com.github.jrubygradle.JRubyPrepareJars

      • Prepare embedded jars or all jars used by JRuby by telling the location of those jars via JARS_HOME environment. The directory uses a maven repository layout as per jar-dependencies.

        Authors:
        Schalk W. Cronj√©
        R Tyler Croy
        Christian Meier
